translated: The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Section on the Triad and Duka in the Paṭṭhāna

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.83. Sanidassanattika, Savicāraduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ savicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naavicāro dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho🔽naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sa nidassana ttika sa vicāra duka  anidassana appaṭigham sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha  anidassana appaṭigham avicāram dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na avicāraḥ dhammaḥ  uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham avicāram dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ  na avicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham avicāram dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naavicāro ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti🔽hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na avicāraḥ ca na anidassana sa paṭighaḥ na avicāraḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti 🔽hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
